name: Strip Black Jack - At The Pub
name_original: Strip Black Jack - At The Pub
description:
It's Friday night and you want to end the evening in your favorite pub when you meet the woman of your dreams. Soon it shows that she's not as shy and innocent as she looks because she invites you to a game of Strip Blackjack.
"Very soon your clothes will lie on the floor and I on top of you", you think...
Can you defeat the pretty lady and want to experience an erotic adventure? - Then you've come to the right place!
If you want to make it easy for yourself, choose the "Easy Mode" or take the hard way to really give it to her!

By the way: In this game you can have sex with both ladies this time!

## NEW ##
Now with very Easy Mode for the impatient among you :)
Get even more money with each won round!
Now get more money from the lucky wheel!
